pkgmetadata.longdescription: A PHP-based webhosting-oriented control panel for servers.

use.flag: Support for the Application Packaging Standard
Adds support for writing BIND configuration files
Adds support for writing DKIM DNS-Records and Filters for them
Adds support for FTP Quotas for use with ProFTPd
Adds support for logging actions in the Panel
Adds support for Quotas for the maildirs of Customers
Adds support for the Ticket System
